alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County; Goshen County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 24 at 2:45AM MST until November 24 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 9 inches with locally higher amounts up to 12 inches possible on elevated terrain. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Platte, Goshen, and Sioux Counties. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact post-holiday travel.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County; Goshen County
